name: My partner and I were looking for an appartment
name_original: My partner and I were looking for an appartment
description:
Made in 7 hours as part of Global Game Jam Yarra 2019.
Made in Australia.

Arrow Keys/WASD to move
Space/Enter to talk
Mouse to click Yeah or Nah
Esc to exit, F to Fullscreen, R to reset.

Twitter: @b3nTurner
